duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform tire service duties such as repairs, balancing tires, and changing tires as required based on sales mix in location.
Perform car service duties including lubrications, oil changes, and basic vehicle inspections.
Unload and load items from trucks, move them into warehouse storage, and maintain service center standards of cleanliness and orderliness.
Comply with company safety policy and federal/state OSHA safety requirements, and drive vehicles as required.
Interact with superiors in a non-sales capacity and perform other duties as assigned by Store Manager, Service Manager, or Manager of Vehicle Services.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license at all times
